about.aboutContent:
How to Use this App

Basics:
Click and Drag to pan around the map. Pinch or scroll to zoom.

Search:
To search for a place, type a name into the search bar on the upper left. To search within a category, select one from the drop-down menu to the left of the search bar.

Bookmarks:
Areas of Interest around Calgary have been highlighted with bookmarks. Click the book icon below the search bar on the upper left to focus around different areas.

Query:

The Day One map is populated with all the essentials of getting settled in Calgary, so find exactly what you need by picking a category from the drop-down menu and typing in a specific sub-category such as ‘Daycare’ or ‘Walk-In Clinics’.

Near Me:
Find the closest library, family doctor, or career centre to you by selecting from the categories from the drop-down menu to the left of the search bar and choosing a level of proximity in kilometres.


Share:
The share icon lets you share this app on Twitter, FB, Youtube and other social media.

Layer List:
The layers icon lets you toggle all the different layers of entries on or off. Each layer corresponds to a specific category, such as immigration resources, recreational areas, and others.
